# django-simple-publish-model

Django application provides simple publish/unpublish model and admin.

## Install

```
pip install django-simple-publish-model
```


## Usage

**pro/settings.py**

```
INSTALLED_APPS = [
    ...
    'django_fastadmin',
    'django_simple_publish_model',
    ...
]
```

**app/models.py**

```

```

- First release.
